page.title: 05INDUSTRY
page.content: Much of the area is situated in the green belt and consequently does not possess any large industrial concerns. They exist mainly to the North (Marconi and Morgans) and in the highly industrialised areas of Ellesmere Port and Birkenhead. One of the primary industries in the area is dairy farming. In a small scale survey the following industries were identified:- 1.Farming 2.Waste disposal 3.Secondary Windows 4.Bakeries 5.D.I.Y. 6.Garages 7.Brickyards 8.Timberyard 9.Colal depot 10.Builders 11.Sanfire Industry Merchants Lack of large-scale industrial concerns in the area result in many people commuting by train, bus and car to other industrial areas.
